Transform Modes

Fit

Preserves entire video, adds letterbox bars

Fill

Crops to fill frame completely

Stretch

Stretches to fit (may distort)

Output Formats

MP4

Universal format, best compatibility

Free

MOV

Apple QuickTime, high quality

Pro

MKV

Open source, multi-track support

Pro

AVI

Microsoft format, large files

Pro

Web video, royalty-free

How It Works

Convert in Three Simple Steps

No complex settings, no learning curve. Just upload, choose, and download.

1

Upload Your Video

Drag and drop your video file or click to browse. Supports MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, and WebM.

2

Choose Settings

Select your target aspect ratio, output format, and transform mode. Preview the result instantly.

3

Download & Share

Your converted video is ready! Download it and share directly to TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube.
